name: The Wyoming Incident: ReWIsited
description:
After 8 years, the original "The Wyoming Incident: The Game" game is updated. Experience the new feelings of this awesome video!

Chicago, Illinois. November 22, 1987.

You playing as the witness of broadcast signal intrusion, also known as "The Wyoming Incident". But today, this incident will be intruded in your life.
Is it real? Does it have any sense?
That's why you're here!

  • An updated version of original game, created in 2010.
  • Using the last version of "Raycasting Game Maker".
  • Most of the resources have been recreated.
  • New storyline.
  • More easter eggs. Can you find them all?

REMEMBER - THEY STILL STAND AT THE DOOR!
